dict.acceptation: 困境；定位于；受操纵的事；应急措施；

sent.orig: According to dynamic data exchange (DDE) technique, data communication between FIX and VC application is implemented.
sent.trans: 该方法利用FIX工控软件的动态数据交换 (DDE)技术 ，将FIX工控软件作为DDE服务器与VC + +应用程序进行数据交换。

sent.orig: The automatic control of boiler's drum level and steam temperature is realized by applying FIX software.
sent.trans: 介绍应用FIX软件实现热电厂锅炉的温度、水位自动控制。

sent.orig: FIX software provides the hardware system with upper supervision and data collection functions.
sent.trans: FIX软件为硬件系统提供上位监控和数据采集功能。

sent.orig: Fix-1 is up to the production demands and can be put into mass production.
sent.trans: Fix－1符合生产要求，可大批量生产。

sent.orig: Fix the mitochondria, and you might fix aging itself.
sent.trans: 修复线粒体，就有可能修复一个老化的你。
